title.narrative: PAGUDEL Phase II

description.narrative: The project is part of a larger MENA programme with the Dutch MFA as lead donor through the Dutch Stability Fund Instrument.

title.narrative: 3.1 15 diagnostic reports and three in-depth audit reports (not including CNC) + three CNF profiles, allow identifying capacities to be strengthened in partner municipalities.
15 diagnostic reports and three in-depth audit reports (not including CNC) + three CNF profiles, allow identifying capacities to be strengthened in partner municipalities.

target.value: 15 diagnostic reports and three in-depth audit reports (not including CNC) + three CNF profiles. allow identifying capacities to be strengthened in partner municipalities.

actual.value: 3 CNC profiles completed (Laayoun. Thibar and Sidi Makhlouf). 15 financial and organizational diagnoses of which 3 were completed (Medenine. Jendouba. Raoued. Kasserine. Benguerdane. Dhehiba. Thala. Sidi Bouzid. Regueb. Metlaoui. Béjà. Kef. Essers. Siliana and Krib).

target.value: 15 diagnostic reports and three in-depth audit reports (not including CNC) + three CNF profiles. allow identifying capacities to be strengthened in partner municipalities.

actual.value: 3 CNC profiles completed (Laayoun. Thibar and Sidi Makhlouf). 15 financial and organizational diagnoses of which 3 were completed (Medenine. Jendouba. Raoued. Kasserine. Benguerdane. Dhehiba. Thala. Sidi Bouzid. Regueb. Metlaoui. Béjà. Kef. Essers. Siliana and Krib).

target.value: 15 diagnostic reports and 3 independent audit reports (excl.NC) + three CNF profiles allow identifying capacities to be strengthened

title.narrative: 3.3 At least 03 partner municipalities use the toolkit of management and democratic and decentralized governance that improves the level of citizen satisfaction and has a positive financial impact on municipal finances.

At least 03 partner municipalities use the toolkit of management and democratic and decentralized governance that improves the level of citizen satisfaction and has a positive financial impact on municipal finances.

target.value: At least 03 partner municipalities use the toolkit of management and democratic and decentralized governance that improves the level of citizen satisfaction and has a positive financial impact on municipal finances.

actual.value: A kit of 05 municipal management softwares was installed in Raoued. Jendouba and Medenine with training courses for the staff of these communes on its handling.

target.value: At least 03 partner municipalities use the toolkit of management and democratic and decentralized governance that improves the level of citizen satisfaction and has a positive financial impact on municipal finances.

actual.value: A kit of 05 municipal management softwares was installed in Raoued. Jendouba and Medenine with training courses for the staff of these communes on its handling.

title.narrative: 5.1 01 youth employment development strategy, improving the local business environment, is developed in 02 municipalities under the SDV (Béjà and Sidi Bouzid).
01 youth employment development strategy, improving the local business environment, is developed in 02 municipalities under the SDV (Béjà and Sidi Bouzid).

target.value: 01 youth employment development strategy. improving the local business environment. is developed in 02 municipalities under the SDV (Béjà and Sidi Bouzid).

actual.value: An economic SDV is elaborated for the city of Béja. including the identification of job niches and the training programs that go with it. development axes and structuring projects. It was presented to local partners. An economic SDV of Sidi Bouzid is elaborated. A concept of the Municipal Business Forum is developed. All these products presented to the MFPE for validation in January and February 2018. Two restitution seminars are scheduled in March / April in Beja and Sidi Bouzid.

target.value: 01 youth employment development strategy. improving the local business environment. is developed in 02 municipalities under the SDV (Béjà and Sidi Bouzid).

actual.value: An economic SDV is elaborated for the city of Béja. including the identification of job niches and the training programs that go with it. development axes and structuring projects. It was presented to local partners. An economic SDV of Sidi Bouzid is elaborated. A concept of the Municipal Business Forum is developed. All these products presented to the MFPE for validation in January and February 2018. Two restitution seminars are scheduled in March / April in Beja and Sidi Bouzid.

In addition to the Béja SDV . an economic SDV for Sidi Bouzid has also been designed. A concept for a Munici pal Business Forum has been elaborated. All of the products have been presented to the MFPE for validation in Jan.-Feb. 2018 followed by a seminar in Béja.

title.narrative: FNVT support services for municipalities have improved

The ‘FNVT’ (National Federation of Tunisian Cities) has improved is support services for municipalities and has developed its lobbying and advocacy functions so as to ensure the participation of municipalities in the decentralization process.

target.value: Through workshps the FNVT cotributes to atleast 2 law reviews or reformsin the area of decentralisation

actual.value: 3 national and 2 regional workshps organised w. FNVT that defended a profound revision of the law on territory and urbanism

target.value: FNVT (The Tunisian Association of towns) creates a platform for technical assistance to sstrengthen their indepedence

actual.value: FNVT platform established
One group of 4 experts acts as an provides assitance to local municipalities in the Northeastern region of Tunisia.

title.narrative: 3.2 At least 03 partner municipalities participated in the development of their municipal institutional development plan and initiated organizational changes related to the realization of this plan.
At least 03 partner municipalities participated in the development of their municipal institutional development plan and initiated organizational changes related to the realization of this plan.

target.value: At least 03 partner municipalities participated in the development of their municipal institutional development plan and initiated organizational changes related to the realization of this plan.

actual.value: The 3 municipalities of Medenine. Jendouba and Raoued participated in the development of PDICs.

target.value: At least 03 partner municipalities participated in the development of their municipal institutional development plan and initiated organizational changes related to the realization of this plan.

actual.value: The 3 municipalities of Medenine. Jendouba and Raoued participated in the development of PDICs.

title.narrative: 3.4 02 multi-stakeholder and multi-dimensional cities development strategies (CDSs) are conducted with the support of PAGUDEL II in at least two partner municipalities, in partnership with “CitiesAlliance” and the CDS documents are adopted as reference fo

02 multi-stakeholder and multi-dimensional cities development strategies (CDSs) are conducted with the support of PAGUDEL II in at least two partner municipalities, in partnership with “CitiesAlliance” and the CDS documents are adopted as reference for the planning of municipal and local action and the planning of municipal investments

target.value: 02 multi-stakeholder and multi-dimensional cities development strategies (CDSs) are conducted with the support of PAGUDEL II in at least two partner municipalities. in partnership with “CitiesAlliance” and the CDS documents are adopted as reference for the planning of municipal and local action and the planning of municipal investments

actual.value: The capitalization process completed and the strategic frameworks nearly completed in July. 2018.

target.value: 02 multi-stakeholder and multi-dimensional cities development strategies (CDSs) are conducted with the support of PAGUDEL II in at least two partner municipalities. in partnership with “CitiesAlliance” and the CDS documents are adopted as reference for the planning of municipal and local action and the planning of municipal investments

actual.value: The development process of the Sidi Bouzid and Béja CDSs is evolving in line with the joint program UNDP. GIZ. Medcités. CILG-VNGI. funded by Cities Alliance. The capitalization mission is started. The elaboration of the city development strategic frameworks will be completed on April 15. 2018.

target.value: 02 multi-stakeholder and multi-dimensional cities development strategies (CDSs) are conducted with the support of PAGUDEL II in at least two partner municipalities. in partnership with “CitiesAlliance” and the CDS documents are adopted as reference for the planning of municipal and local action and the planning of municipal investments

actual.value: The development process of the Sidi Bouzid and Béja CDSs is evolving in line with the joint program UNDP. GIZ. Medcités. CILG-VNGI. funded by Cities Alliance. The capitalization mission is started. The elaboration of the city development strategic frameworks will be completed on April 15. 2018.

title.narrative: 5.4 01 Specific integrated development approach to marginalized border areas and targeting excluded populations, especially unemployed young people of both sexes, is developed in partnership with the MDICI for border delegations.

01 Specific integrated development approach to marginalized border areas and targeting excluded populations, especially unemployed young people of both sexes, is developed in partnership with the MDICI for border delegations.

target.value: 01 Specific integrated development approach to marginalized border areas and targeting excluded populations. especially unemployed young people of both sexes. is developed in partnership with the MDICI for border delegations.

actual.value: Extension of the mission following recommendations from the MDICI and other national partners. This mission will be completed at the end of the 1st quarter of 2018.

target.value: 01 Specific integrated development approach to marginalized border areas and targeting excluded populations. especially unemployed young people of both sexes. is developed in partnership with the MDICI for border delegations.

actual.value: The document has been completed and submitted to MDICI and other relevant national. international and local partners. Extension of the mission following recommendations from the MDICI and other national partners.

target.value: 01 Specific integrated development approach to marginalized border areas and targeting excluded populations. especially unemployed young people of both sexes. is developed in partnership with the MDICI for border delegations.

actual.value: The mission was completed in February 2018.

title.narrative: 5.3 At least 04 municipal pilot projects to promoting youth employment of both sexes and local economic development are being implemented.
At least 04 municipal pilot projects to promoting youth employment of both sexes and local economic development are being implemented.

actual.value: x PPM-DEL in Dhehiba completed. x PPM-DEL in Sers: completed x PPM-DEL in Siliana: completed. x PPM-DEL in Gafsa: Care waste treatment unit started working and covers 10 'communes'.

target.value: At least 04 municipal pilot projects to promoting youth employment of both sexes and local economic development are being implemented.

actual.value: x PPM-DEL in Dhehiba completed: Photovoltaic energy pumpingfor irrigationand olive plantations. x PPM-DEL in Sers: Nursery for horticultural plants. Installation work is in progress.x PPM-DEL in Siliana: Leisure area for the family and the child. Swimming pool installed.work engagedfor the restaurant construction. x PPM-DEL in Gafsa: Care waste treatment unit. Start-up of the plant planned end of March 2018.
